remarks.para: The PublishingPageRouter organizes objects in a content organizer-enabled site that is based on rules that are configured for Publishing content types in the site.

Docs.param: The object that is the original page
object that represents the final destination to which the original page was routed.
Docs.summary: Attempts to route the page within a folder in the pages list. If no rules match, it will attempt to distribute the pages within automatically generated folders based on folder size.
